name: Compass
description: Compass is a travelers best friend.   You can use Compass in all outdoor activities as you can think about - walking, sailing, hiking, climbing, camping, flying, reading a map and so much more.   FEATURES - One of the most accurate in its category - 6 sleek visual styles  Future, Galaxy, Retro, Military, Pirate, and Classic - Optimized for all screen sizes - Landscape and portrait orientations for tablets (depending on the default screen orientation) - Calibration/interference warning (can be toggled on/off) - Compass is one of the few apps that supports all Android versions  1.5 to 5.0  Please Note: Your device should have a MAGNETIC SENSOR inside, otherwise the app will not work.  Get in touch with us and follow the latest news regarding our apps: http://www.facebook.com/macropinch http://twitter.com/macropinch
